title: NIN Ghosts I-IV Widescreen Wallpaper Rescale Pack
description:
NIN Ghosts I-IV Widescreen Wallpaper Rescale Pack

The original digital download of Nine Inch Nails Ghosts I-IV came with a set of highly detailed, highly artistic wallpapers. Unfortunately they were only presented in one aspect ratio. In the interest of saving time, and just having a bit of fun, I&#039;ve cropped, resized and in some cases GIMPed around with the wallpapers to make what i feel ar proper 16x10 renditions.

Most wallpapers were a simple crop job as there was a lot of "space", however several required the use of a Liquid Resize inorder to preserve what i felt was the original artists intended vision and Wallpaper2 was a royal bitch to fix. I Had to crave out the NIN logo, clone over the hole, crop down the top and then fit the logo back in, in order to avoid butchering the birds. I&#039;m not happy with the position of the Logo in terms of it&#039;s relationship to the background gradient, but hey, this is what i got. Maybe i&#039;ll fix it later.

All images edited using GIMP 2.4.

Ghosts I-IV is available now from http://ghosts.nin.com in 320 kbps MP3, FLAC Lossless and Apple Lossless for only $5. You owe it to yourself to check it out.

All Images released under the Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5 Canada License. This license fully complies with the requirements of the original artworks original license.

Cut by Njiska.
